dev.relism.mobleaderboard.storage

Interface Storage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayerStorage

    public interface Storage
    A generic interface representing asynchronous storage operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompletableFuture<com.mongodb.client.FindIterable<org.bson.Document>> findDocuments(String fieldIdentifier, Object valueIdentifier)
      Finds documents based on a field and its value asynchronously.
      CompletableFuture<Object> getFieldValue(String documentType, String fieldToGet)
      Retrieves the value of a specific field from a document asynchronously.
      CompletableFuture<Void> insertDocument(org.bson.Document document)
      Inserts a document asynchronously.
      CompletableFuture<Void> setFieldValue(String documentType, String fieldToSet, Object newValue)
      Sets the value of a specific field in a document asynchronously.

    • Method Detail

      • getFieldValue

        CompletableFuture<Object> getFieldValue(String documentType,
                                        String fieldToGet)
        Retrieves the value of a specific field from a document asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        documentType - the identifier of the document
        fieldToGet - the name of the field to retrieve
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture containing the value of the specified field

      • setFieldValue

        CompletableFuture<Void> setFieldValue(String documentType,
                                      String fieldToSet,
                                      Object newValue)
        Sets the value of a specific field in a document asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        documentType - the identifier of the document
        fieldToSet - the name of the field to update
        newValue - the new value to set for the field
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture that completes when the field is updated

      • insertDocument

        CompletableFuture<Void> insertDocument(org.bson.Document document)
        Inserts a document asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        document - the document to insert
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture that completes when the document is inserted

      • findDocuments

        CompletableFuture<com.mongodb.client.FindIterable<org.bson.Document>> findDocuments(String fieldIdentifier,
                                                                                    Object valueIdentifier)
        Finds documents based on a field and its value asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        fieldIdentifier - the name of the field to search
        valueIdentifier - the value to search for in the field
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture containing a FindIterable of matching documents
